mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_STUDENT (UID, UPWD, UPWDQ, UPWDA, ULASTNAME, UFIRSTNAME, UEMAIL, UBIRTH, UPHONE, UZIPCODE, UADDRESS, UADDRESSDETAIL) VALUES(#{uid}, #{upwd}, #{upwdq}, #{upwda}, #{ulastname}, #{ufirstname}, #{uemail}, #{ubirth}, #{uphone}, #{uzipcode}, #{uaddress}, #{uaddressdetail})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STUDENT WHERE UID = #{uid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STUDENT WHERE UID = #{uid} AND UPWD = #{upwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ACADEMY (ANAME, AID, ACORPORATE, APWD, APWDQ, APWDA, AEMAIL, APHONE, AZIPCODE, AADDRESS, AADDRESSDETAIL) VALUES(#{Aname}, #{Aid}, #{Acorporate}, #{Apwd}, #{Apwdq}, #{Apwda}, #{Aemail}, #{Aphone}, #{Azipcode}, #{Aaddress}, #{Aaddressdetail})
